data: Get ready to bring your creativity to life at Shot ur Story, an exhilarating short film-making competition! This event challenges filmmakers of all skill levels to craft a captivating short film that tells a powerful narrative. Whether you’re an aspiring director, writer, or editor, this is your chance to showcase your storytelling talent and artistic vision.Participants will have the freedom to explore various genres and themes, all within a limited timeframe.With the opportunity to earn recognition and exciting prizes. Join us for a day of inspiration, collaboration, and cinematic magic—let’s see how you can Shot Your Story!
Frame your story, where your imagination meets the screen.
